org.openimaj.image.processor

Interface ImageProcessor<I extends Image<?,I>>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - The type of image that this processor can process
    All Superinterfaces:
    Processor<I>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Inpainter<IMAGE>, SinglebandImageProcessor<T,S>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFMMInpainter, AbstractImageMaskInpainter, AbstractLocalThreshold, AdaptiveLocalThresholdBernsen, AdaptiveLocalThresholdContrast, AdaptiveLocalThresholdGaussian, AdaptiveLocalThresholdMean, AdaptiveLocalThresholdMedian, AnisotropicDiffusion, AverageBoxFilter, BasicBackgroundSubtract, BicubicInterpolation, BilinearInterpolation, BrightnessClusteringTransform, CannyEdgeDetector, CannyEdgeDetector2, CLConvolve2D, CLImageProcessor, Close, CompassOperators.Compass0, CompassOperators.Compass135, CompassOperators.Compass45, CompassOperators.Compass90, DifferenceOfGaussian, DioramaEffect, Disk, EfrosLeungInpainter, EqualisationProcessor, FConvolution, FDiscGausConvolve, FFastGaussianConvolve, FGaussianConvolve, FImageConvolveSeparable, FixedResizeProcessor, FourierConvolve, FourierCorrelation, FSobelX, FSobelY, FTriangleFilter, Gaussian2D, Laplacian3x3, LaplacianOfGaussian2D, LiuSamarabanduTextExtractorBasic, LiuSamarabanduTextExtractorMultiscale, LocalContrastFilter, MaskedRobustContrastEqualisation, MaxFilter, MeanCenter, MedianFilter, MinFilter, Open, OrientedPolygonExtractionProcessor, OtsuThreshold, PiecewiseMeshWarp, RemapProcessor, ResizeProcessor, SequentialThin, SimplePyramid, Skeleton, SkewCorrector, StrokeWidthTransform, SumBoxFilter, SUSANEdgeDetector, TeleaInpainting, TextExtractor, Thicken, Thin

    public interface ImageProcessor<I extends Image<?,I>>
extends Processor<I>
    An interface for objects that are able to process whole images. The processing must be performed in-place; that is, the input image is side-affected by the processing.

    If you don't want to alter the image content, use an ImageAnalyser instead.

    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void processImage(I image)
      Process an image.

    • Method Detail

      • processImage

        void processImage(I image)
        Process an image. Implementing classes must alter the image passed in-place or assign the output to the input using Image.internalAssign(Image).
        Parameters:
        image - The image to process in place.
